content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -11.5, 25.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid, while the boiler has no input liquid and is not connected.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, 5.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, 5.0)

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of a lab (position 0.0, 0.0) that is currently not powered and is researching automation.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure there are no placement blockages when attempting to connect pipes. Check the surrounding area for any entities that may obstruct the connection.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check that the tile is not occupied by another entity.
